00057 extern int get_parallel_size();
00058 extern double reduce_parallel_max(double value);

00060 #define MSQ_DBGOUT_P0_ONLY(flag) if (!get_parallel_rank()) MSQ_DBGOUT(flag)
00061 
00062 #define RPM(val) val
00063 
00064 // this causes race conditions - don't use it
00065 #define RPM1(val) reduce_parallel_max(val)
00066 
00068 enum TCType {
00069    NONE    = 0,
00073    GRADIENT_L2_NORM_ABSOLUTE = 1<<0,  
00077    GRADIENT_INF_NORM_ABSOLUTE = 1<<1,
00082    GRADIENT_L2_NORM_RELATIVE = 1<<2,
00088    GRADIENT_INF_NORM_RELATIVE = 1<<3,
00090    KKT  = 1<<4,
00093    QUALITY_IMPROVEMENT_ABSOLUTE = 1<<5,
00097    QUALITY_IMPROVEMENT_RELATIVE = 1<<6,
00099    NUMBER_OF_ITERATES = 1<<7,
00102    CPU_TIME  = 1<<8,
00105    VERTEX_MOVEMENT_ABSOLUTE  = 1<<9,
00109    VERTEX_MOVEMENT_ABS_EDGE_LENGTH  = 1<<10,
00114    VERTEX_MOVEMENT_RELATIVE  = 1<<11,
00117    SUCCESSIVE_IMPROVEMENTS_ABSOLUTE = 1<<12,
00122    SUCCESSIVE_IMPROVEMENTS_RELATIVE = 1<<13,
00126    BOUNDED_VERTEX_MOVEMENT = 1<<14,
00128    UNTANGLED_MESH = 1<<15
00129 };
00130 
00131 
00132 const unsigned long GRAD_FLAGS = GRADIENT_L2_NORM_ABSOLUTE |
00133                                  GRADIENT_INF_NORM_ABSOLUTE |
00134                                  GRADIENT_L2_NORM_RELATIVE |
00135                                  GRADIENT_INF_NORM_RELATIVE;
00136 const unsigned long OF_FLAGS   = QUALITY_IMPROVEMENT_ABSOLUTE |
00137                                  QUALITY_IMPROVEMENT_RELATIVE |
00138                                  SUCCESSIVE_IMPROVEMENTS_ABSOLUTE |
00139                                  SUCCESSIVE_IMPROVEMENTS_RELATIVE;
00140 
00141 const unsigned long MOVEMENT_FLAGS = VERTEX_MOVEMENT_ABSOLUTE |
00142                                      VERTEX_MOVEMENT_ABS_EDGE_LENGTH |
00143                                      VERTEX_MOVEMENT_RELATIVE;
00144 
00147   TerminationCriterion::TerminationCriterion(std::string name, InnerOuterType innerOuterType)
00148   : mGrad(8),
00149     initialVerticesMemento(0),
00150     previousVerticesMemento(0),
00151     debugLevel(2),
00152     timeStepFileType(NOTYPE), moniker(name), innerOuterType(innerOuterType)
00153 {
00154   terminationCriterionFlag=NONE;
00155   cullingMethodFlag=NONE;
00156   cullingEps=0.0;
00157   cullingGlobalPatch=false;
00158   initialOFValue=0.0;
00159   previousOFValue=0.0;
00160   currentOFValue = 0.0;
00161   lowerOFBound=0.0;
00162   initialGradL2NormSquared=0.0;
00163   initialGradInfNorm=0.0;
00164     //initial size of the gradient array
00165   gradL2NormAbsoluteEpsSquared=0.0;
00166   gradL2NormRelativeEpsSquared=0.0;
00167   gradInfNormAbsoluteEps=0.0;
00168   gradInfNormRelativeEps=0.0;
00169   qualityImprovementAbsoluteEps=0.0;
00170   qualityImprovementRelativeEps=0.0;
00171   iterationBound=0;
00172   iterationCounter=0;
00173   timeBound=0.0;
00174   vertexMovementAbsoluteEps=0.0;
00175   vertexMovementRelativeEps=0.0;
00176   vertexMovementAvgBeta = -1;
00177   vertexMovementAbsoluteAvgEdge = -1; 
00178   successiveImprovementsAbsoluteEps=0.0;
00179   successiveImprovementsRelativeEps=0.0;
00180   boundedVertexMovementEps=0.0;
00181   globalInvertedCount = 0;
00182   patchInvertedCount = 0;
00183   
00184 }

00186 std::string TerminationCriterion::par_string() 
00187 {
00188   if (get_parallel_size())
00189     {
00190       std::ostringstream str;
00191       str << "P[" << get_parallel_rank() << "] " + moniker + " ";
00192       return str.str();
00193     }
00194   return moniker + " ";
00195 }

00197 void TerminationCriterion::add_absolute_gradient_L2_norm( double eps )
00198 {
00199        terminationCriterionFlag|=GRADIENT_L2_NORM_ABSOLUTE;
00200        gradL2NormAbsoluteEpsSquared=eps*eps;
00201 }  
00202 
00203 void TerminationCriterion::add_absolute_gradient_inf_norm( double eps )
00204 {
00205        terminationCriterionFlag|=GRADIENT_INF_NORM_ABSOLUTE;
00206        gradInfNormAbsoluteEps=eps;
00207 }

00210 {
00211        terminationCriterionFlag|=GRADIENT_L2_NORM_RELATIVE;
00212        gradL2NormRelativeEpsSquared=eps*eps;
00213 }
00214

00216 {
00217        terminationCriterionFlag|=GRADIENT_INF_NORM_RELATIVE;
00218        gradInfNormRelativeEps=eps;
00219 }

00233 void TerminationCriterion::add_absolute_vertex_movement( double eps )
00234 {
00235        terminationCriterionFlag|=VERTEX_MOVEMENT_ABSOLUTE;
00236          //we actually compare squared movement to squared epsilon
00237        vertexMovementAbsoluteEps=(eps*eps);

00345 
00350 void TerminationCriterion::reset_outer(Mesh* mesh, 
00351                                        MeshDomain* domain,
00352                                        OFEvaluator& obj_eval,
00353                                        const Settings* settings,
00354                                        MsqError &err)
00355 {
00356   const unsigned long totalFlag = terminationCriterionFlag | cullingMethodFlag;
00357   PatchData global_patch;
00358   if (settings)
00359     global_patch.attach_settings( settings );
00360   
00361     //if we need to fill out the global patch data object.
00362   if ((totalFlag & (GRAD_FLAGS | OF_FLAGS | VERTEX_MOVEMENT_RELATIVE | UNTANGLED_MESH))
00363      || timeStepFileType)
00364   {
00365     global_patch.set_mesh( mesh );
00366     global_patch.set_domain( domain );
00367     global_patch.fill_global_patch( err );
00368     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00369   }
00370 
00371     //now call the other reset
00372   reset_inner( global_patch, obj_eval, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00373 }
00374     
00392 void TerminationCriterion::reset_inner(PatchData &pd, OFEvaluator& obj_eval,
00393                                     MsqError &err)
00394 {
00395   const unsigned long totalFlag = terminationCriterionFlag | cullingMethodFlag;
00396   
00397     // clear flag for BOUNDED_VERTEX_MOVEMENT
00398   vertexMovementExceedsBound = 0;
00399   
00400     // Use -1 to denote that this isn't initialized yet.
00401     // As all valid values must be >= 0.0, a negative
00402     // value indicates that it is uninitialized and is
00403     // always less than any valid value.
00404   maxSquaredMovement = -1;
00405   
00406     // Clear the iteration count.
00407   iterationCounter = 0;
00408   
00409     //reset the inner timer if needed
00410   if(totalFlag & CPU_TIME){
00411     mTimer.reset();
00412   }
00413    
00414     //GRADIENT
00415   currentGradInfNorm = initialGradInfNorm = 0.0;
00416   currentGradL2NormSquared = initialGradL2NormSquared = 0.0;
00417   if(totalFlag & GRAD_FLAGS)
00418   {
00419     if (!obj_eval.have_objective_function()) {
00420       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Error termination criteria set which uses objective "
00421                       "functions, but no objective function is available.",
00422                       MsqError::INVALID_STATE);   
00423       return;
00424     } 
00425     int num_vertices=pd.num_free_vertices();
00426     mGrad.resize( num_vertices );
00427 
00428       //get gradient and make sure it is valid
00429     bool b = obj_eval.evaluate(pd, currentOFValue, mGrad, err); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00430     if (!b) {
00431       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Initial patch is invalid for gradient computation.", 
00432                       MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00433       return;
00434     } 
00435 
00436       //get the gradient norms
00437     if (totalFlag & (GRADIENT_INF_NORM_ABSOLUTE|GRADIENT_INF_NORM_RELATIVE))
00438     {
00439       currentGradInfNorm = initialGradInfNorm = Linf(mGrad);
00440       MSQ_DBGOUT_P0_ONLY(debugLevel) << par_string() << "  o Initial gradient Inf norm: " << " "
00441                                      << RPM(initialGradInfNorm) << std::endl;
00442     }  
00443       
00444     if (totalFlag & (GRADIENT_L2_NORM_ABSOLUTE|GRADIENT_L2_NORM_RELATIVE))
00445     {
00446       currentGradL2NormSquared = initialGradL2NormSquared = length_squared(mGrad);
00447       MSQ_DBGOUT_P0_ONLY(debugLevel) << par_string() << "  o Initial gradient L2 norm: " << " "
00448                                      << RPM(std::sqrt(initialGradL2NormSquared)) << std::endl;
00449     }  
00450 
00451       //the OFvalue comes for free, so save it
00452     previousOFValue=currentOFValue;
00453     initialOFValue=currentOFValue;
00454   }
00455   //find the initial objective function value if needed and not already
00456   //computed.  If we needed the gradient, we have the OF value for free.
00457   // Also, if possible, get initial OF value if writing plot file.  Solvers
00458   // often supply the OF value for subsequent iterations so by calculating
00459   // the initial value we can generate OF value plots.
00460   else if ((totalFlag & OF_FLAGS) || 
00461            (plotFile.is_open() && pd.num_free_vertices() && obj_eval.have_objective_function()))
00462   {
00463       //ensure the obj_ptr is not null
00464     if(!obj_eval.have_objective_function()){
00465       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Error termination criteria set which uses objective "
00466                       "functions, but no objective function is available.",
00467                       MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00468       return;
00469     }
00470     
00471     bool b = obj_eval.evaluate(pd, currentOFValue, err); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00472     if (!b){
00473       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Initial patch is invalid for evaluation.",MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00474       return;
00475     }
00476       //std::cout<<"\nReseting initial of value = "<<initialOFValue;
00477     previousOFValue=currentOFValue;
00478     initialOFValue=currentOFValue;
00479   }
00480   
00481   if (totalFlag & (GRAD_FLAGS|OF_FLAGS))
00482     MSQ_DBGOUT_P0_ONLY(debugLevel) << par_string() << "  o Initial OF value: " << " " << RPM(initialOFValue) << std::endl;
00483   
00484     // Store current vertex locations now, because we'll
00485     // need them later to compare the current movement with.
00486   if (totalFlag & VERTEX_MOVEMENT_RELATIVE)
00487   {
00488     if (initialVerticesMemento)
00489     {
00490       pd.recreate_vertices_memento( initialVerticesMemento, err );
00491     }
00492     else
00493     {
00494       initialVerticesMemento = pd.create_vertices_memento( err );
00495     }
00496     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00497     maxSquaredInitialMovement = DBL_MAX;
00498   }
00499   else {
00500     maxSquaredInitialMovement = 0;
00501   }
00502   
00503   if (terminationCriterionFlag & UNTANGLED_MESH) {
00504     globalInvertedCount = count_inverted( pd, err );
00505     //if (innerOuterType==TYPE_OUTER) MSQ_DBGOUT_P0_ONLY(debugLevel) << par_string() << "  o Num Inverted: " << " " << globalInvertedCount << std::endl;
00506     patchInvertedCount = 0;
00507     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00508   }
00509 
00510   if (timeStepFileType) {
00511       // If didn't already calculate gradient abive, calculate it now.
00512     if (!(totalFlag & GRAD_FLAGS)) {
00513       mGrad.resize( pd.num_free_vertices() );
00514       obj_eval.evaluate(pd, currentOFValue, mGrad, err);
00515       err.clear();
00516     }
00517     write_timestep( pd, mGrad.empty() ? 0 : arrptr(mGrad), err);
00518   }
00519     
00520   if (plotFile.is_open()) {
00521       // two newlines so GNU plot knows that we are starting a new data set
00522     plotFile << std::endl << std::endl;
00523       // write column headings as comment in data file
00524     plotFile << "#Iter\tCPU\tObjFunc\tGradL2\tGradInf\tMovement\tInverted" << std::endl;
00525       // write initial values
00526     plotFile << 0 
00527      << '\t' << mTimer.since_birth() 
00528      << '\t' << initialOFValue 
00529      << '\t' << std::sqrt( currentGradL2NormSquared ) 
00530      << '\t' << currentGradInfNorm 
00531      << '\t' << 0.0
00532      << '\t' << globalInvertedCount
00533      << std::endl;
00534   }
00535 }
00536 
00537 void TerminationCriterion::reset_patch(PatchData &pd, MsqError &err)
00538 {
00539   const unsigned long totalFlag = terminationCriterionFlag | cullingMethodFlag;
00540   if (totalFlag & MOVEMENT_FLAGS)
00541   {
00542     if (previousVerticesMemento)
00543       pd.recreate_vertices_memento(previousVerticesMemento,err); 
00544     else
00545       previousVerticesMemento = pd.create_vertices_memento(err);
00546     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00547   }
00548 
00549   if (totalFlag & UNTANGLED_MESH) {
00550     patchInvertedCount = count_inverted( pd, err );
00551     //MSQ_DBGOUT_P0_ONLY(debugLevel) << par_string() << "  o Num Patch Inverted: " << " " << patchInvertedCount << std::endl;
00552     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00553   }
00554 }
00555 
00556 void TerminationCriterion::accumulate_inner( PatchData& pd, 
00557                                              OFEvaluator& of_eval,
00558                                              MsqError& err )
00559 {
00560   double of_value = 0;
00561   
00562   if (terminationCriterionFlag & GRAD_FLAGS)
00563   {
00564     mGrad.resize( pd.num_free_vertices() );
00565     bool b = of_eval.evaluate(pd, of_value, mGrad, err);
00566     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00567     if (!b) {
00568       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Initial patch is invalid for gradient compuation.",
00569                       MsqError::INVALID_MESH);
00570       return;
00571     }
00572   }
00573   else if (terminationCriterionFlag & OF_FLAGS)
00574   {
00575     bool b = of_eval.evaluate(pd, of_value, err); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00576     if (!b) {
00577       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid patch passed to TerminationCriterion.",
00578                       MsqError::INVALID_MESH);
00579       return;
00580     }
00581   }
00582 
00583   accumulate_inner( pd, of_value, mGrad.empty() ? 0 : arrptr(mGrad), err );  MSQ_CHKERR(err);
00584 }
00585 
00586 
00587 void TerminationCriterion::accumulate_inner( PatchData& pd, 
00588                                              double of_value,
00589                                              Vector3D* grad_array,
00590                                              MsqError& err )
00591 {
00592   //if terminating on the norm of the gradient
00593   //currentGradL2NormSquared = HUGE_VAL;
00594   if (terminationCriterionFlag & (GRADIENT_L2_NORM_ABSOLUTE | GRADIENT_L2_NORM_RELATIVE)) 
00595   {
00596     currentGradL2NormSquared = length_squared(grad_array, pd.num_free_vertices()); // get the L2 norm
00597     MSQ_DBGOUT_P0_ONLY(debugLevel) << par_string() << "  o Info -- gradient L2 norm: " << " "
00598                                    << RPM(std::sqrt(currentGradL2NormSquared)) << std::endl;
00599   }
00600   //currentGradInfNorm = 10e6;
00601   if (terminationCriterionFlag & (GRADIENT_INF_NORM_ABSOLUTE | GRADIENT_INF_NORM_RELATIVE)) 
00602   {
00603     currentGradInfNorm = Linf(grad_array, pd.num_free_vertices()); // get the Linf norm
00604     MSQ_DBGOUT_P0_ONLY(debugLevel) << par_string() << "  o Info -- gradient Inf norm: " << " "
00605                                    << RPM(currentGradInfNorm) << std::endl;
00606   } 
00607   
00608   if (terminationCriterionFlag & VERTEX_MOVEMENT_RELATIVE)
00609   {
00610     maxSquaredInitialMovement = pd.get_max_vertex_movement_squared(
00611                                initialVerticesMemento, err );  MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00612     MSQ_DBGOUT_P0_ONLY(debugLevel) << par_string() << "  o Info -- max initial vertex movement: " << " "
00613                                    << RPM(maxSquaredInitialMovement) << std::endl;
00614   }
00615   
00616   previousOFValue = currentOFValue;
00617   currentOFValue = of_value;
00618   if (terminationCriterionFlag & OF_FLAGS) {
00619     MSQ_DBGOUT_P0_ONLY(debugLevel) << par_string() << "  o Info -- OF Value: " << " " << RPM(of_value) << " iterationCounter= " << iterationCounter << std::endl;
00620   }
00621   else if (grad_array) {
00622     MSQ_DBGOUT_P0_ONLY(debugLevel) << par_string() << "  o OF Value: " << " " << RPM(of_value) << " iterationCounter= " << iterationCounter 
00623       //<< " terminationCriterionFlag= " << terminationCriterionFlag << " OF_FLAGS = " << OF_FLAGS
00624                                    << std::endl;
00625   }
00626   
00627   ++iterationCounter;
00628   if (timeStepFileType)
00629     write_timestep( pd, grad_array, err);
00630     
00631   if (plotFile.is_open()) 
00632     plotFile << iterationCounter 
00633      << '\t' << mTimer.since_birth() 
00634      << '\t' << of_value 
00635      << '\t' << std::sqrt( currentGradL2NormSquared ) 
00636      << '\t' << currentGradInfNorm 
00637      << '\t' << (maxSquaredMovement > 0.0 ? std::sqrt( maxSquaredMovement ) : 0.0)
00638      << '\t' << globalInvertedCount
00639      << std::endl;
00640 }
00641 
00642 
00643 void TerminationCriterion::accumulate_outer(Mesh* mesh, 
00644                                             MeshDomain* domain, 
00645                                             OFEvaluator& of_eval,
00646                                             const Settings* settings,
00647                                             MsqError &err)
00648 {
00649   PatchData global_patch;
00650   if (settings)
00651     global_patch.attach_settings( settings );
00652   
00653     //if we need to fill out the global patch data object.
00654   if ((terminationCriterionFlag & (GRAD_FLAGS|OF_FLAGS|VERTEX_MOVEMENT_RELATIVE))
00655       || timeStepFileType)
00656   {
00657     global_patch.set_mesh( mesh );
00658     global_patch.set_domain( domain );
00659     global_patch.fill_global_patch( err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00660   }
00661   
00662   accumulate_inner( global_patch, of_eval, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00663 }
00664 
00665 
00666 void TerminationCriterion::accumulate_patch( PatchData& pd, MsqError& err )
00667 {
00668   if (terminationCriterionFlag & MOVEMENT_FLAGS)
00669   {
00670     double patch_max_dist = pd.get_max_vertex_movement_squared( previousVerticesMemento, err );
00671     if (patch_max_dist > maxSquaredMovement)
00672       maxSquaredMovement = patch_max_dist;
00673     pd.recreate_vertices_memento( previousVerticesMemento, err );  MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00674   }
00675     
00676     //if terminating on bounded vertex movement (a bounding box for the mesh)
00677   if(terminationCriterionFlag & BOUNDED_VERTEX_MOVEMENT)
00678   {
00679     const MsqVertex* vert = pd.get_vertex_array(err);
00680     int num_vert = pd.num_free_vertices();
00681     int i=0;
00682       //for each vertex
00683     for(i=0;i<num_vert;++i)
00684     {
00685         //if any of the coordinates are greater than eps
00686       if( (vert[i][0]>boundedVertexMovementEps) ||
00687           (vert[i][1]>boundedVertexMovementEps) ||
00688           (vert[i][2]>boundedVertexMovementEps) )
00689       {
00690         ++vertexMovementExceedsBound;
00691       }
00692     }
00693   }
00694 
00695 
00696   if ((terminationCriterionFlag|cullingMethodFlag) & UNTANGLED_MESH) {
00697     size_t new_count = count_inverted( pd, err );
00698       // be careful here because size_t is unsigned
00699     globalInvertedCount += new_count;
00700     globalInvertedCount -= patchInvertedCount;
00701     patchInvertedCount = new_count;
00702     //if (innerOuterType==TYPE_OUTER) 
00703     //  MSQ_DBGOUT_P0_ONLY(debugLevel) << par_string() << "  o Num Patch Inverted: " << " " << patchInvertedCount << " globalInvertedCount= " << globalInvertedCount << std::endl;
00704       
00705     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00706   }
00707 }
00708 
00709 
00714 bool TerminationCriterion::terminate( )
00715 {
00716   bool return_flag = false;
00717   //std::cout<<"\nInside terminate(pd,of,err):  flag = "<<terminationCriterionFlag << std::endl;
00718   int type=0;
00719 
00720     //First check for an interrupt signal
00721   if (MsqInterrupt::interrupt())
00722   {
00723      MSQ_DBGOUT_P0_ONLY(debugLevel) << par_string() << "  o TermCrit -- INTERRUPTED" << " " << std::endl;
00724     return true;
00725   }
00726   
00727     //if terminating on numbering of inner iterations
00728   if (NUMBER_OF_ITERATES & terminationCriterionFlag
00729     && iterationCounter >= iterationBound)
00730   {
00731     return_flag = true;
00732     type=1;
00733     MSQ_DBGOUT_P0_ONLY(debugLevel) << par_string() << "  o TermCrit -- Reached " << " " << iterationBound << " iterations." << std::endl;
00734   }
00735   
00736   if (CPU_TIME & terminationCriterionFlag && mTimer.since_birth()>=timeBound)
00737   {
00738     return_flag=true;
00739     type=2;
00740     MSQ_DBGOUT_P0_ONLY(debugLevel) << par_string() << "  o TermCrit -- Exceeded CPU time. " << " " << std::endl;
00741   }
00742   
00743   
00744   if (MOVEMENT_FLAGS & terminationCriterionFlag
00745       && maxSquaredMovement >= 0.0)
00746   {
00747     MSQ_DBGOUT_P0_ONLY(debugLevel) << par_string() << "  o Info -- Maximum vertex movement: " << " "
00748                                    << RPM(sqrt(maxSquaredMovement)) << std::endl;
00749 
00750     if (VERTEX_MOVEMENT_ABSOLUTE & terminationCriterionFlag 
00751         && maxSquaredMovement <= vertexMovementAbsoluteEps)
00752     {
00753       MSQ_DBGOUT_P0_ONLY(debugLevel) << par_string() << "  o TermCrit -- VERTEX_MOVEMENT_ABSOLUTE: " << " "
00754                                      << RPM(sqrt(maxSquaredMovement)) << std::endl;
00755       return_flag = true;
00756     type=3;
00757     }
00758   
00759     if (VERTEX_MOVEMENT_RELATIVE & terminationCriterionFlag
00760         && maxSquaredMovement <= vertexMovementRelativeEps*maxSquaredInitialMovement)
00761     {
00762       MSQ_DBGOUT_P0_ONLY(debugLevel) << par_string() << "  o TermCrit -- VERTEX_MOVEMENT_RELATIVE: " << " "
00763                                      << RPM(sqrt(maxSquaredMovement)) << std::endl;
00764       return_flag = true;
00765     type=4;
00766     }
00767 
00768     if (VERTEX_MOVEMENT_ABS_EDGE_LENGTH & terminationCriterionFlag)
00769     {
00770       assert( vertexMovementAbsoluteAvgEdge > -1e-12 ); // make sure value actually got calculated
00771       if (maxSquaredMovement <= vertexMovementAbsoluteAvgEdge)
00772       {
00773         MSQ_DBGOUT_P0_ONLY(debugLevel) << par_string() << "  o TermCrit -- VERTEX_MOVEMENT_ABS_EDGE_LENGTH: " << " "
00774                                        << RPM(sqrt(maxSquaredMovement)) << std::endl;
00775         return_flag = true;
00776         type=5;
00777       }
00778     }
00779   }
00780 
00781   if (GRADIENT_L2_NORM_ABSOLUTE & terminationCriterionFlag &&
00782       currentGradL2NormSquared <= gradL2NormAbsoluteEpsSquared)
00783   {
00784     MSQ_DBGOUT_P0_ONLY(debugLevel) << par_string() << "  o TermCrit -- GRADIENT_L2_NORM_ABSOLUTE: " << " " << RPM(currentGradL2NormSquared) << std::endl;
00785     return_flag = true;
00786     type=6;
00787   }
00788   
00789   if (GRADIENT_INF_NORM_ABSOLUTE & terminationCriterionFlag &&
00790       currentGradInfNorm <= gradInfNormAbsoluteEps)
00791   {
00792     MSQ_DBGOUT_P0_ONLY(debugLevel) << par_string() << "  o TermCrit -- GRADIENT_INF_NORM_ABSOLUTE: " << " " << RPM(currentGradInfNorm) << std::endl;
00793     return_flag = true;
00794     type=7;
00795   }
00796   
00797   if (GRADIENT_L2_NORM_RELATIVE & terminationCriterionFlag &&
00798       currentGradL2NormSquared <= (gradL2NormRelativeEpsSquared * initialGradL2NormSquared))
00799   {
00800     MSQ_DBGOUT_P0_ONLY(debugLevel) << par_string() << "  o TermCrit -- GRADIENT_L2_NORM_RELATIVE: " << " " << RPM(currentGradL2NormSquared) << std::endl;
00801     return_flag = true;
00802     type=8;
00803   }
00804   
00805   if (GRADIENT_INF_NORM_RELATIVE & terminationCriterionFlag &&
00806       currentGradInfNorm <= (gradInfNormRelativeEps * initialGradInfNorm))
00807   {
00808     MSQ_DBGOUT_P0_ONLY(debugLevel) << par_string() << "  o TermCrit -- GRADIENT_INF_NORM_RELATIVE: " << " " << RPM(currentGradInfNorm) << std::endl;
00809     return_flag = true;
00810     type=9;
00811   }
00812     //Quality Improvement and Successive Improvements are below.
00813     // The relative forms are only valid after the first iteration.
00814   if ((QUALITY_IMPROVEMENT_ABSOLUTE & terminationCriterionFlag) &&
00815       currentOFValue <= qualityImprovementAbsoluteEps)
00816   {
00817     MSQ_DBGOUT_P0_ONLY(debugLevel) << par_string() << "  o TermCrit -- QUALITY_IMPROVEMENT_ABSOLUTE: " << " " << RPM(currentOFValue) << std::endl;
00818     return_flag = true;
00819     type=10;
00820   }
00821   
00822     //only valid if an iteration has occurred, see above.
00823   if(iterationCounter > 0){
00824     if (SUCCESSIVE_IMPROVEMENTS_ABSOLUTE & terminationCriterionFlag &&
00825         (previousOFValue - currentOFValue) <= successiveImprovementsAbsoluteEps)
00826     {  
00827       MSQ_DBGOUT_P0_ONLY(debugLevel) << par_string() << "  o TermCrit -- SUCCESSIVE_IMPROVEMENTS_ABSOLUTE: previousOFValue= " << " " << previousOFValue << " currentOFValue= " << RPM(currentOFValue) 
00828                              << " successiveImprovementsAbsoluteEps= " << successiveImprovementsAbsoluteEps
00829                              << std::endl;
00830       return_flag = true;
00831     type=11;
00832     }
00833     if (QUALITY_IMPROVEMENT_RELATIVE & terminationCriterionFlag &&
00834         (currentOFValue - lowerOFBound) <= 
00835         qualityImprovementRelativeEps * (initialOFValue - lowerOFBound))
00836     {
00837       MSQ_DBGOUT_P0_ONLY(debugLevel) << par_string() << "  o TermCrit -- QUALITY_IMPROVEMENT_RELATIVE: " << " " << std::endl;
00838       return_flag = true;
00839     type=12;
00840     }
00841     if (SUCCESSIVE_IMPROVEMENTS_RELATIVE & terminationCriterionFlag &&
00842         (previousOFValue - currentOFValue) <= 
00843         successiveImprovementsRelativeEps * (initialOFValue - currentOFValue))
00844     {
00845       MSQ_DBGOUT_P0_ONLY(debugLevel) << par_string() << "  o TermCrit -- SUCCESSIVE_IMPROVEMENTS_RELATIVE: previousOFValue= " << " " << previousOFValue << " currentOFValue= " << RPM(currentOFValue) 
00846                              << " successiveImprovementsRelativeEps= " << successiveImprovementsRelativeEps
00847                              << std::endl;
00848       return_flag = true;
00849     type=13;
00850     }
00851   }
00852   
00853   if (BOUNDED_VERTEX_MOVEMENT & terminationCriterionFlag && vertexMovementExceedsBound)
00854   {
00855     return_flag = true;
00856     type=14;
00857     MSQ_DBGOUT_P0_ONLY(debugLevel) << par_string() << "  o TermCrit -- " << " " << vertexMovementExceedsBound
00858                            << " vertices out of bounds." << std::endl;
00859   }
00860   
00861   if (UNTANGLED_MESH & terminationCriterionFlag)
00862   {
00863     if (innerOuterType==TYPE_OUTER) {
00864       //MSQ_DBGOUT_P0_ONLY(debugLevel) 
00865       MSQ_DBGOUT(debugLevel) 
00866         << par_string() << "  o Num Inverted: " << " " << globalInvertedCount << std::endl;
00867     }
00868     if (!globalInvertedCount)
00869       {
00870         MSQ_DBGOUT_P0_ONLY(debugLevel) << par_string() << "  o TermCrit -- UNTANGLED_MESH: "<< " " << std::endl;
00871         return_flag = true;
00872         type=15;
00873       }
00874   }
00875   
00876     // clear this value at the end of each iteration
00877   vertexMovementExceedsBound = 0;
00878   maxSquaredMovement = -1.0;
00879 
00880   if (timeStepFileType == GNUPLOT && return_flag) {
00881     MsqError err;
00882     MeshWriter::write_gnuplot_overlay( iterationCounter, timeStepFileName.c_str(), err );
00883   }
00884 
00885   if (0 && return_flag && MSQ_DBG(2))
00886     std::cout << "P[" << get_parallel_rank() << "] tmp TerminationCriterion::terminate: " << moniker << " return_flag= " << return_flag << " type= " << type
00887               << " terminationCriterionFlag= " << terminationCriterionFlag << " debugLevel= " << debugLevel << std::endl;
00888   
00889     //if none of the criteria were satisfied
00890   return return_flag;
00891 }
00892 
00893 
00903 bool TerminationCriterion::cull_vertices(PatchData &pd,
00904                                       OFEvaluator& of_eval,
00905                                       MsqError &err)
00906 {
00907     //PRINT_INFO("CULLING_METHOD FLAG = %i",cullingMethodFlag);
00908   
00909     //cull_bool will be changed to true if the criterion is satisfied
00910   bool b, cull_bool=false;
00911   double prev_m, init_m;
00912   switch(cullingMethodFlag){
00913       //if no culling is requested, always return false
00914     case NONE:
00915        return cull_bool;
00916          //if culling on quality improvement absolute
00917     case QUALITY_IMPROVEMENT_ABSOLUTE:
00918          //get objective function value
00919        b = of_eval.evaluate(pd, currentOFValue, err);
00920        if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) return false;
00921        if (!b) {
00922          MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_MESH);
00923          return false;
00924        }
00925          //if the improvement was enough, cull
00926        if(currentOFValue <= cullingEps)
00927        {
00928          cull_bool=true;  
00929        }
00930          //PRINT_INFO("\ncurrentOFValue = %f, bool = %i\n",currentOFValue,cull_bool);
00931        
00932        break;
00933          //if culing on quality improvement relative
00934     case QUALITY_IMPROVEMENT_RELATIVE:
00935          //get objective function value
00936        b = of_eval.evaluate(pd, currentOFValue, err);
00937        if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) return false;
00938        if(!b){
00939          MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_MESH);
00940          return false;
00941        }
00942          //if the improvement was enough, cull
00943        if((currentOFValue-lowerOFBound)<=
00944           (cullingEps*(initialOFValue-lowerOFBound)))
00945        {
00946          cull_bool=true;  
00947        }
00948        break;
00949          //if culling on vertex movement absolute
00950     case VERTEX_MOVEMENT_ABSOLUTE:
00951     case VERTEX_MOVEMENT_ABS_EDGE_LENGTH:
00952          //if movement was enough, cull
00953        prev_m = pd.get_max_vertex_movement_squared(previousVerticesMemento,err);
00954        MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00955        if(prev_m <= cullingEps*cullingEps){
00956          cull_bool=true;  
00957        }
00958        
00959        break;
00960          //if culling on vertex movement relative
00961     case VERTEX_MOVEMENT_RELATIVE:
00962          //if movement was small enough, cull
00963        prev_m = pd.get_max_vertex_movement_squared(previousVerticesMemento,err);
00964        MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00965        init_m = pd.get_max_vertex_movement_squared(initialVerticesMemento,err);
00966        MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00967        if(prev_m <= (cullingEps*cullingEps * init_m)){
00968          cull_bool=true;  
00969        }
00970        break;
00971     case UNTANGLED_MESH:
00972       if (!patchInvertedCount)
00973         cull_bool = true;
00974       break;
00975     default:
00976        MSQ_SETERR(err)("Requested culling method not yet implemented.",
00977                        MsqError::NOT_IMPLEMENTED);
00978        return false;
00979   };
00980     //Now actually have patch data cull vertices
00981   if(cull_bool)
00982   {
00983     pd.set_free_vertices_soft_fixed(err); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00984   }
00985   else
00986   {
00987     pd.set_all_vertices_soft_free(err); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00988   }
00989   return cull_bool;
00990 }
00991 
00996 bool TerminationCriterion::cull_vertices_global(PatchData &global_patch,
00997                                                 Mesh *mesh, MeshDomain *domain, const Settings *settings,
00998                                                 OFEvaluator& of_eval,
00999                                                 MsqError &err)
01000 {
01001   if (!cullingGlobalPatch) return false;
01002 
01003     //PRINT_INFO("CULLING_METHOD FLAG = %i",cullingMethodFlag);
01004   
01005     //cull_bool will be changed to true if the criterion is satisfied
01006   bool b, cull_bool=false;
01007 
01008   bool inner_crit_terminated, all_culled;
01009 
01010   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> mesh_vertices;
01011   //std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> patch_vertices;
01012   //std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle> patch_elements;
01013   //std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> fixed_vertices;
01014   //std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> free_vertices;
01015 
01016   // FIXME, verify global_patch is a global patch... how, is this right?
01017   mesh->get_all_vertices(mesh_vertices, err);
01018   size_t mesh_num_nodes = mesh_vertices.size();
01019   size_t global_patch_num_nodes = global_patch.num_nodes() ;
01020   if (0)  std::cout << "tmp srk mesh_num_nodes= " << mesh_num_nodes << " global_patch_num_nodes= " 
01021             << global_patch_num_nodes << std::endl;
01022   if (mesh_num_nodes != global_patch_num_nodes)
01023     {
01024       std::cout << "tmp srk cull_vertices_global found non global patch" << std::endl;
01025       exit(123);
01026       return false;
01027     }
01028   PatchData patch;
01029   patch.set_mesh( (Mesh*) mesh );
01030   patch.set_domain( domain );
01031   patch.attach_settings( settings );
01032 
01033   const MsqVertex* global_patch_vertex_array = global_patch.get_vertex_array( err );
01034   Mesh::VertexHandle* global_patch_vertex_handles = global_patch.get_vertex_handles_array();
01035 
01036   int num_culled = 0;
01037   for (unsigned iv=0; iv < global_patch_num_nodes; iv++)
01038     {
01039       // form a patch for this vertex; if it is culled, set it to be soft fixed
01040       Mesh::VertexHandle vert = global_patch_vertex_handles[iv];
01041       std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle> elements;
01042       std::vector<size_t> offsets;
01043       mesh->vertices_get_attached_elements(&vert, 1, elements, offsets, err);
01044       
01045       std::set<Mesh::VertexHandle> patch_free_vertices_set;
01046 
01047       for (unsigned ie=0; ie < elements.size(); ie++)
01048         {
01049           std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> vert_handles;
01050           std::vector<size_t> v_offsets;
01051           mesh->elements_get_attached_vertices(&elements[ie], 1, vert_handles, v_offsets, err);
01052           for (unsigned jv=0; jv < vert_handles.size(); jv++)
01053             {
01054               unsigned char bt;
01055               mesh->vertex_get_byte(vert_handles[jv], &bt, err);
01056               MsqVertex v;
01057               v.set_flags(bt);
01058               if (v.is_free_vertex())
01059                 patch_free_vertices_set.insert(vert_handles[jv]);
01060             }
01061         }
01062 
01063       std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> patch_free_vertices_vector(patch_free_vertices_set.begin(), patch_free_vertices_set.end());
01064       //std::vector<unsigned char> byte_vector(patch_vertices_vector.size());
01065       //mesh->vertices_get_byte(&vert_handles[0], &byte_vector[0], vert_handles.size(), err);
01066 
01067       patch.set_mesh_entities( elements, patch_free_vertices_vector, err );
01068       if (cull_vertices(patch, of_eval, err))
01069         {
01070           //std::cout << "tmp srk cull_vertices_global found culled patch" << std::endl;
01071           Mesh::VertexHandle* patch_vertex_handles = patch.get_vertex_handles_array();
01072           const MsqVertex* patch_vertex_array = patch.get_vertex_array( err );
01073           for (unsigned jv=0; jv < patch.num_nodes(); jv++)
01074             {
01075               if (patch_vertex_handles[jv] == global_patch_vertex_handles[iv])
01076                 {
01077                   if (patch_vertex_array[jv].is_flag_set(MsqVertex::MSQ_CULLED))
01078                     {
01079                       global_patch.set_vertex_culled(iv);
01080                       ++num_culled;
01081                       cull_bool = true;
01082                       //std::cout << "tmp srk cull_vertices_global found culled vertex" << std::endl;
01083                     }
01084                 }
01085             }
01086         }
01087     }
01088     if (0)  std::cout << "tmp srk cull_vertices_global found " << num_culled << " culled vertices out of " << global_patch_num_nodes << std::endl;
01089 
01090   return cull_bool;
01091 }
01092 
01093 size_t TerminationCriterion::count_inverted( PatchData& pd, MsqError& err )
01094 {
01095   size_t num_elem = pd.num_elements();
01096   size_t count=0;
01097   int inverted, samples;
01098   for (size_t i = 0; i < num_elem; i++) {
01099     pd.element_by_index(i).check_element_orientation(pd, inverted, samples, err);
01100     if (inverted)
01101       ++count;
01102   }
01103   return count;
01104 }
01105 
01111 void TerminationCriterion::cleanup(Mesh* mesh, MeshDomain*, MsqError &err)
01112 {
01113   delete previousVerticesMemento;
01114   delete initialVerticesMemento;
01115   previousVerticesMemento = 0;
01116   initialVerticesMemento = 0;
01117 }
01118 
01119 void TerminationCriterion::write_timestep( PatchData& pd, 
01120                                            const Vector3D* gradient,
01121                                            MsqError& err )
01122 {
01123   std::ostringstream str;
01124   if (timeStepFileType == VTK) {
01125     str << timeStepFileName << '_' << iterationCounter << ".vtk";
01126     MeshWriter::write_vtk( pd, str.str().c_str(), err, gradient );
01127   }
01128   else if (timeStepFileType == GNUPLOT) {
01129     str << timeStepFileName << '.' << iterationCounter;
01130     MeshWriter::write_gnuplot( pd.get_mesh(), str.str().c_str(), err );
01131   }
01132 }
01133 
01134 void TerminationCriterion::write_iterations( const char* filename, MsqError& err )
01135 {
01136   if (filename) {
01137     plotFile.open( filename, std::ios::trunc );
01138     if (!plotFile)
01139       MSQ_SETERR(err)( MsqError::FILE_ACCESS, "Failed to open plot data file: '%s'", filename );
01140   }
01141   else {
01142     plotFile.close();
01143   }
01144 }
01145     
01146     
01147 void TerminationCriterion::initialize_queue( Mesh* mesh,
01148                                              MeshDomain* ,
01149                                              const Settings* ,
01150                                              MsqError& err )
01151 {
01152   if (VERTEX_MOVEMENT_ABS_EDGE_LENGTH & (terminationCriterionFlag|cullingMethodFlag)) 
01153   {
01154     MeshUtil tool(mesh);
01155     SimpleStats stats;
01156     tool.edge_length_distribution( stats, err );
01157     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01158     double limit = vertexMovementAvgBeta * (stats.average() - stats.standard_deviation());
01159       // we actually calculate the square of the length
01160     vertexMovementAbsoluteAvgEdge = limit * limit;
01161     if (VERTEX_MOVEMENT_ABS_EDGE_LENGTH & cullingMethodFlag)
01162       cullingEps = limit;
01163   }
01164 }

01166 } //namespace Mesquite
Generated on Thu May 17 15:57:14 2012 for MESQUITE by  1.4.7
